title: Sergio de las Heras
text: Welcome to my site! I am Sergio de las Heras, master in Electrical Engineering, Information Technology and Computer Engineering, but I am mostly interested in acoustics and pyschoacoustics. I like exploring new ways of doing things and continuously learning.

title: Sergio de las Heras
text:
About Me
I have a background in Telecommunication Technologies. Over the years, I have worked on diverse projects in both academic and private sector.
